settings.subtext: Strip your wire insulation 1/3" on both wire ends & twist the strands together.
Use SolderStick Sleeve to connect the wires together with the right connector size.
Apply heat with a heat gun, lighter or blow dryer while continuously rotating the wire.
Enjoy your secured and waterproof wire connection!

settings.review_text: Using a heat gun they provided and it was super easy to slip it on, twist the wires and slip it back on to solder and seal in one swoop is wicked cool! Very happy! Gave them
Work excellent! Seal AND solder wires together! I just hit them for about 15 seconds with my heat gun till shrink tube shrunk then solder melted to wire leads...boom, done!
This solder sleeve works exactly how it is described & kills two birds with one stone of soldering wire as well as sealing the connection. It is a huge time-saver.
After about 5 seconds the rubber material started to shrink. At about 9 seconds the solder started to melt & bond the wires. I gave the wires a firm tug & there were super tight.

I have found that if there are any wires out of alignment, there is a chance they will poke through the plastic, especially if you over-heat. per instructions, be sure NOT to squeeze the lead ring - it will crack, and then not melt to seal properly....

This is the perfect solution to splicing wires. You strip the ends of the wires to be spliced, put the ends into the tube and then run the hair dryer to heat up and activate the bead of solder inside the tube and shrink the plastic ends to form a splice that will not fall apart the second you release the joint.
I used a heat gun. It was satisfying to see the solder melt as the ends crimped down to make a strong waterproof connection. Perfect for the new LED spotlights on my Jeep.

I had rats chew through some wiring on my car used these and they work fantastic! All you got to do is just strip the wire put the wire in and use a Bic lighter to heat up the whole thing evenly and then that's it you're done. Repeat buyer

settings.text: What is included in the SolderStick Ferrule Connector Kit?
settings.content: The kit includes a variety of ferrule connectors in multiple sizes, designed to accommodate a wide range of wire gauges for versatile applications.

settings.text: What are ferrule connectors used for?
settings.content: Ferrule connectors provide a secure, stable connection for stranded wires by preventing fraying and ensuring consistent electrical conductivity. They are ideal for automotive, marine, industrial, and household electrical projects.

settings.text: Why should I use ferrule connectors instead of bare wire?
settings.content: Ferrules improve safety and reliability by preventing wire fraying, ensuring even current distribution, and reducing the risk of loose or unstable connections.

settings.text: Can the SolderStick Fork Connector handle vibrations?
settings.content: Absolutely. The connector is designed to maintain stability and reliability, even in environments with constant movement, such as vehicles and boats.

settings.text: How do I install a ferrule connector?
settings.content: Simply strip the wire, insert it into the ferrule, and crimp it using a compatible crimping tool to secure the connection.

settings.text: Do I need special tools to use the ferrules?
settings.content: A crimping tool is required to securely fasten the ferrule to the wire. Ensure the tool is compatible with the sizes included in the kit.
Yes, the connectors feature color-coded insulated sleeves for added protection and easier identification of wire sizes.

settings.text: Can these connectors withstand harsh environments?
settings.content: Yes, the ferrule connectors are made with high-quality materials that resist corrosion, ensuring reliable performance in challenging environments like automotive and marine settings.

settings.text: What applications are these connectors best suited for?
settings.content: These connectors are perfect for wiring in vehicles, boats, industrial equipment, control panels, and home electrical systems, providing clean and professional connections.

settings.text: Does this kit include a storage case?
settings.content: SolderStick Ferrule Connector Kits come with a compact, organized storage case for easy transportation and accessibility.
Our shipping typically takes 3-5 business days in the USA and 7-10 business days in other parts of the world.
